mapper.select:
select
from card_guomipasstype_tbl where IsDelete = 0 limit #{start},#{pageSize}
select COUNT(ID) from card_guomipasstype_tbl where IsDelete = 0
mapper.delete: update card_guomipasstype_tbl set IsDelete = 1 where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into card_guomipasstype_tbl (ID, CardType, Lifespan, IsDelete, Remark) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lifespan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdelete,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

ID,
